survey_name: Employee Well-being and Work-Life Balance Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' well-being and work-life balance to identify areas for improvement in workplace policies and support systems.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; ensure the scale is displayed horizontally for desktop and vertically for mobile.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance?

questions.question_text: Which of the following work-life balance initiatives would you find most beneficial? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences; include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes; ensure 'Other' option triggers a text field if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following work-life balance initiatives would you find most beneficial? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you feel stressed due to work-related factors?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to measure stress levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; ensure the scale is intuitive and easy to navigate.

script.question_text: How often do you feel stressed due to work-related factors?

questions.question_text: What additional support would you like the company to provide to improve your well-being?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights; limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with character counter; ensure mobile-friendly input.

script.question_text: What additional support would you like the company to provide to improve your well-being?

questions.question_text: Do you feel comfortable discussing well-being concerns with your manager?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point comfort scale to assess openness in communication.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; ensure the scale is clear and accessible.

script.question_text: Do you feel comfortable discussing well-being concerns with your manager?
